chart_description: The User Groups Threads chart shows the number of threads being used by each user group in the system.

dimension_descriptions.1000: Number of threads being used by the user with the UID of 1000
dimension_descriptions.32: Number of threads being used by the daemons group
dimension_descriptions.65532: Number of threads being used by the nobody group
dimension_descriptions.65535: Number of threads being used by the system services group
dimension_descriptions.81: Number of threads being used by the cgroup management daemon
dimension_descriptions.996: Number of threads being used by the kernel documentation team user
dimension_descriptions.997: Number of threads being used by the kernel configuration team user
dimension_descriptions.cm: Number of threads being used by the cluster management user
dimension_descriptions.libvirt: Number of threads being used by the libvirt virtualization user
dimension_descriptions.messagebus: Number of threads being used by the message bus user
dimension_descriptions.netdata: Number of threads being used by the Netdata monitoring software
dimension_descriptions.nobody: Number of threads being used by the nobody user
dimension_descriptions.root: Number of threads being used by the root user
dimension_descriptions.systemd-coredump: Number of threads being used by the systemd coredump service
dimension_descriptions.systemd-journal: Number of threads being used by the systemd journal service
dimension_descriptions.systemd-timesync: Number of threads being used by the systemd timesync service
dimension_descriptions.vpopmail: Number of threads being used by the vpopmail user
dimension_descriptions.xfs: Number of threads being used by the XFS filesystem management user
